= Introduction =




= Using Primitives =

Using primitives. Note that private and protected fields requires appropriate getter and setter methods. 

{{{
@SuppressWarnings("serial")
@StructClass
public class PublicPrimitives implements Serializable {
	@StructField(order = 0)
	public byte b;
	@StructField(order = 1)
	public char c;
	@StructField(order = 2)
	public short s;
	@StructField(order = 3)
	public int i;
	@StructField(order = 4)
	public long lo;
	@StructField(order = 5)
	protected float f;
	@StructField(order = 6)
	private double d;
	
	transient int blah;
	transient double foo;


	public float getF() {
		return f;
	}

	public void setF(float f) {
		this.f = f;
	}

	public double getD() {
		return d;
	}

	public void setD(double d) {
		this.d = d;
	}
}
}}}
